Name: Doomy Gloom
Short Description: When DEFENSIVE is used, a shroud of gloom is produced.
Long Description: When DEFENSIVE is used, a shroud of gloom is produced.

Name: Obol
Short Description: Coin Projectile thrown every 5 seconds. Deals 10 damage if it hits
Long Description: Coin Projectile thrown every 5 seconds. Deals 10 damage if it hits. Costs 1 gold each fight.
Lore: A coin once thrown in a well. An empty wish. Now the Obol wishes to prove its value to you.

Name: Broken Demon Horn
Lore: A horn broken in two. You feel as if the pieces wish to be rejoined.
Notes: Items in the "Garbage" set have the potential to become valuable and transform into a different item under certain conditions

Name: Empty Chocolate Box
Lore: A burnt, heart-shaped box of chocolates. You feel as if the pieces wish to be rejoined.

Name: Shattered Glass Shards
Long Description: Gather with caution, shards are sharp. -1 HP, +5 attack
Lore: The remnants of what was once a fine piece of art. You feel as if the pieces wish to be rejoined.

Name: Superb Glue
Lore: An adhesive made to fix any break or damage. Although, it can't repair a broken person.
Notes: Item will repair the Broken Demon Horn

Name: Well-tempered Chocolates
Notes: Item will fill the Empty Chocolate Box

Name: Oxy-acetylene Torch
Notes: Item will repair the Shattered Glass Shards

Name: Un-whole-y Demon Horn
Lore: Whole again, the Unholy Demon Horn gives off an aura of demonic power.
Notes: This is the repaired version of Broken Demon Horn

Name: Heart-shaped Box of Chocolates
Lore: Whole again, the Heart-shaped Box of Chocolates gives off a wholesome warmth.
Notes: This is the repaired version of the Empty Chocolate Box

Name: Strange Glass Bird
Lore: Whole again, the Strange Glass Bird gives off a strange sound.
Notes: This is the repaired version of the Shattered Glass Shards

Name: Fake Obol
Lore: A mishapen ersatz coin created from inferior metals.

Name: Add Armor
Long Description: TEST ITEM ONLY. Adds 1 armored heart

Name: Add Health
Long Description: TEST ITEM ONLY. Heals for one heart

Name: Add Max Health
Long Description: TEST ITEM ONLY. Adds 1 max health

Name: Add Attack
Long Description: TEST ITEM ONLY. Adds 10% to attack

Name: Add Move Speed
Long Description: TEST ITEM ONLY. Adds 50% move speed
